metadata.titleEn: Mineral content, chemical composition, temperature and pressure estimates of Langshan lherzolite xenoliths in northwestern North China
metadata.titleCn: 华北西北部狼山二辉橄榄岩包体的矿物含量、化学组成及温压估算数据集
metadata.description: This data is the estimation of mineral content, major and trace element composition of mantle peridotite, and the estimation of temperature and pressure of peridotite. The sample is lherzolite from basalt in Langshan area, northwest of North China Craton in 2019. The mineral content of peridotite was estimated by binocular microscope. The data of major and trace elements were obtained by laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry. The estimated data of temperature and pressure of peridotite are calculated by mineral thermobarometer. The obtained data can reveal the lithospheric mantle properties and metasomatic process in northwest North China, and provide evidence for the lithospheric property transition and structural system transition in northwest North China.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据为地幔橄榄岩矿物含量估计、矿物主微量元素组成数据以及橄榄岩的温度压力估算数据。样品为2019年采自华北克拉通西北部狼山地区玄武岩中的二辉橄榄岩。橄榄岩矿物含量估计利用双目显微镜完成。矿物主量元素和微量元素数据都通过激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱仪分析得到。橄榄岩温度压力估算数据根据矿物温压计计算得到。通过获得的数据，可以揭示华北西北部岩石圈地幔性质及交代过程，为华北西北部岩石圈性质转变及构造体制转折提供证据。
metadata.instructions: All data are stored in Excel file. The file name "minabun" represents the mineral content estimation. The name of the file "minmajtra. XLS" represents the composition data of major and trace elements of minerals. The data sheet of major and trace elements of minerals contains major and trace elements of standard sample, olivine, orthopyroxene, clinopyroxene and spinel. The name of the file "PT" represents the estimated data of temperature and pressure.
metadata.instructionsCn: 所有数据以Excel文件存储。文件名称为“MinAbun”的代表矿物含量估计。文件名称为"MinMajTra.xls"代表矿物主微量元素组成数据，矿物主微量元素数据表中含有标样、橄榄石、斜方辉石、单斜辉石、尖晶石的主微量组成。文件名称为“PT”代表温压估算数据。

literatureList.titleEn: Fertile lithospheric mantle underlying ancient continental crust beneath the northwestern North China craton: Significant effect from the southward subduction of the Paleo–Asian Ocean
literatureList.referenceEn: Dai, H.K., Zheng, J.P., Xiong, Q., Su, Y.P., Pan, S.K., Ping, X.Q., & Zhou, X. (2019). Fertile lithospheric mantle underlying ancient continental crust beneath the northwestern North China craton: Significant effect from the southward subduction of the Paleo–Asian Ocean. Geological Society of American Bulletin,  131(1-2), 3-20.

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to estimate mineral content and chemical composition in mantle peridotite xenoliths?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一种用于估计地幔橄榄岩包体中矿物含量和化学成分的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used to estimate mineral content in mantle peridotite xenoliths is utilizing a binocular microscope. For chemical composition, both major and trace elements of minerals are analyzed using laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS).
Example.AnswerCn: 用于估计地幔橄榄岩外来岩矿物含量的数据收集方法之一是利用双目显微镜。对于矿物的化学成分，主要和微量元素的分析采用激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICP-MS）。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of data collection methods used to estimate mineral content and chemical composition in mantle peridotite xenoliths?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于估计地幔橄榄岩外来岩矿物含量和化学成分的数据收集方法的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: binocular microscope, laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry, mineral thermobarometry
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 双目显微镜，激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法，矿物温压计

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What inferences can be made about the lithospheric mantle properties and metasomatic processes in the northwestern part of the North China Craton based on the mineral content and chemical composition data collected from spinel lherzolite xenoliths?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 根据从尖晶石岩浆岩捕虏体收集的矿物成分和化学成分数据，可以对华北克拉通西北部岩石圈地幔的性质和交代作用做出哪些推断？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The mineral content and chemical composition data, along with temperature and pressure estimates, can reveal characteristics of the lithospheric mantle such as its composition, thermal state, and the extent of any metasomatic processes that have occurred. These insights can contribute to understanding the transition in lithospheric properties and tectonic regime changes in the region.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 矿物成分和化学组成数据，以及温度和压力估计，可以揭示岩石圈地幔的特征，如其成分、热状态以及发生的任何交代作用的程度。这些见解有助于理解该地区岩石圈性质的过渡和构造体制的变化。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes inaccuracies in estimating mineral contents and chemical compositions in mantle peridotites?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致估算地幔橄榄岩中矿物含量和化学成分不准确的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Inaccuracies in estimating mineral contents and chemical compositions in mantle peridotites can be caused by limitations in the analysis techniques used, such as the precision of the binocular microscope for mineral content estimation and the accuracy of the laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry for analyzing major and trace elements. Additionally, the variability in sample collection conditions and the inherent heterogeneity of the mantle peridotite samples can contribute to estimation errors.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在估算地幔橄榄岩的矿物含量和化学成分时，可能会由于所使用分析技术的局限性而导致不准确，例如，使用双目显微镜进行矿物含量估算的精度以及激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法分析主要和微量元素的准确性。此外，样品采集条件的变化和地幔橄榄岩样品的固有异质性也可能导致估算误差。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential effects on the understanding of lithospheric mantle properties when mineral content estimates and temperature-pressure calculations are derived from data collected using optical microscopes and laser ablation techniques?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 当矿物成分估计和温度-压力计算是基于使用光学显微镜和激光剥蚀技术收集的数据时，对岩石圈地幔性质的理解可能会产生哪些潜在影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using optical microscopes to estimate mineral content and laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry for elemental analysis allows for precise and detailed data collection. This approach can lead to a more accurate understanding of the lithospheric mantle properties and metasomatic processes in the northwest region of the North China Craton. The data may provide evidence for changes in lithospheric properties and tectonic regime shifts in the area.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用光学显微镜估计矿物含量，并结合激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法进行元素分析，可以实现精确和详细的数据收集。这种方法有助于更准确地理解华北克拉通西北地区的岩石圈地幔特性和交代作用。这些数据可能为该地区岩石圈特性的变化和构造模式的转变提供证据。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective of collecting mineral content and chemical composition data for mantle peridotite xenoliths from the northwestern part of the North China Craton?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集来自华北克拉通西北部的地幔橄榄岩外来岩石的矿物成分和化学成分数据的主要目的是什麼？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective is to reveal the properties and metasomatic processes of the lithospheric mantle in the northwestern part of the North China Craton, providing evidence for the transformation of the lithospheric properties and tectonic regime shifts in the region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是揭示华北克拉通西北部岩石圈地幔的性质和变质作用过程，为该地区岩石圈性质的转变和构造模式的变化提供证据。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are involved in estimating mineral content and chemical composition of mantle peridotite xenoliths from a dataset collected in basalt regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 估计来自玄武岩地区的地幔橄榄岩外来岩石的矿物含量和化学成分涉及哪些程序步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The estimation of mineral content is performed using a binocular microscope. The chemical composition, including major and trace elements of the minerals, is analyzed through laser ablation-inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS). Temperature and pressure estimations for the peridotite are calculated using mineral thermobarometers.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 矿物含量的估计是通过双目显微镜进行的。矿物的化学成分，包括主要和微量元素，通过激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICP-MS）进行分析。对于橄榄岩的温度和压力估计是通过矿物热压计计算得出的。
